entities.name: house of gaunt
entities.description: The House of Gaunt is mentioned as the residence of Mr. Gaunt and his son Morfin. It is described as a place where Ogden visits to see someone.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is introduced as the son of Mr. Gaunt. He is described as having an odd rolling gait and slamming the front door behind him when he leaves the house.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is introduced as a visitor to the House of Gaunt. He is described as being pure-blood and having a certain respect for Ogden.

entities.name: mr gaunt
entities.description: Mr. Gaunt is introduced as the father of Morfin. He is described as an old man who seems to be aggressive towards Ogden.

relationships.description: Ogden visits the House of Gaunt.
Morfin resides in the House of Gaunt.
Ogden visits Mr. Gaunt at his residence, the House of Gaunt.
Mr. Gaunt is the parent of Morfin.
